com.b2international.index.lucene

Class DocIdCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.SimpleCollector
      • com.b2international.index.lucene.DocIdCollector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.lucene.search.Collector, org.apache.lucene.search.LeafCollector

    public class DocIdCollector
extends org.apache.lucene.search.SimpleCollector
    A collector storing all document ID in a DocIdCollector.DocIds instance.
    See Also:
    DocIdCollector.DocIds, DocIdCollector.DocIdsIterator

    • Constructor Detail

      • DocIdCollector

        public DocIdCollector(int size)
        Creates a document ID collector instance.
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the backing bit set. Preferably the maximum document ID.
        See Also:
        create(int)

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static DocIdCollector create(int size)
        Factory method for creating DocIdCollector instance.
        Parameters:
        size - the number of documents that are expected to be collected.
        Note:  if more documents are collected, unexpected exceptions may be thrown. Usually clients should pass IndexReader.maxDoc() of the same IndexReader with which the search is executed.
